summary: This report discusses Mrs. Charlotta Maria Christ, the wife of a man arrested in Cuba, and the information she has been given by the Agency regarding her husband's situation, including his association with Formosa and attempts to secure his release.
summary_one_paragraph: This 1961 report details the information provided by the CIA to Mrs. Charlotta Maria Christ, wife of an individual arrested in Cuba for his involvement in Formosan activities and radio surveillance. After her husband’s arrest, Mrs. Christ and her daughter were brought to New York, provided with lodging, and given a weekly allowance. The CIA informed her about her husband’s cover employment with Vachats Associates, alien documentation, and the circumstances of his arrest, along with other individuals. The report also outlines ongoing efforts to secure her husband's release, including communications with Cuban attorneys and potential exchange offers, while emphasizing the need to withhold specific operational details from Mrs. Christ to protect the integrity of the efforts.
title: Mrs. Charlotta Maria Christ, alias Carlotta Maria Van Trees.
